customer_name: Wild Hooves Farm Animal Rescue Inc
site_name: WILD HOOVES FARM ANIMAL RESCUE INC

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:20 PM on
16-Apr-19.
Knocked on the door and no answer. Yelled hello twice. Called the phone number on the file and left a message.
Sent a text to the phone number. Waited in the driveway for 20 minutes. The licensee came out of the house and
stated that she had a previously scheduled appointment a 6 PM.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:20 PM on
16-Apr-19.
Knocked on the door and no answer.  Yelled hello twice.  Called the phone number on the file and left a message. 
Sent a text to the phone number.  Waited in the driveway for 20 minutes.  The licensee came out of the house and
stated that she had a previously scheduled appointment a 6 PM.
